title: Introduc. to C Programming
description: C programming is a versatile and influential programming language. It's known for its efficiency, low-level system access, and portability.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Python is a high-level, versatile programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It's widely used.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem solving in programming involves breaking down complex tasks, designing step-by-step solutions, writing code, testing and fixing errors.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system that allows you to store, organize, and manage data efficiently.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software engineering is the systematic and disciplined approach to designing, developing, and maintaining software systems, ensuring they are reliable.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Basic data structures are fundamental components in computer programming that allow you to organize and store data efficiently.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: An algorithm is a step-by-step set of instructions or a well-defined process for solving a problem or performing a task in cse and other fields.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: cloud computing provides a wide range of on-demand cloud services, like computing power, storage, databases, networking, analytics etc.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ is a widely used language for implementing dataStructures & algorithms.It provides many features like OOP,templates etc.
